attributes.action: Standards commissioner to investigate Cameron's tax affairs
attributes.background: We the people should have trust in our public servants, it is in the public interest to know if the Prime Minister has avoided or evaded paying taxes whilst describing people who have engaged in this practice as morally wrong.

rejection.details:
The Parliamentary Commissioner for Standards is independent of the Government and Parliament. If you want to contact the Commissioner's Office, you can find the details here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/contact-us/
